General_Description: '''The Marauders' Lesson''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Bandits were a constant threat to those already much put upon by war. Kassandra was tasked with the destruction of these craven opportunists.
